manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Australia-designed Award-Winning* Tritan Baby Milk Feeding Bottle Made of Glass but Built to Last! The Evorie Tritan Feeding Bottle offers the best of both worlds - style and functionality. Crafted with durable Tritan material, this bottle is as clear as glass yet shatter-resistant. Its wide neck design ensures easy cleaning, and the soft silicone teat provides a comfortable feeding experience for your little one. Embrace a modern and reliable feeding solution with Evorie Tritan! BPS and BPA FreeCompliant with strictest European saftey standards (see next section)Anti-colic air system prevents unwanted air and reduces colicUltra soft silicone teat mimics natural breastfeeding and minimisze nipple confusionEasy to use, clean and assemble (Dishwasher safe)Ultra-clear yet extremely durable and lightweight *Awarded Good Design Award by Good Design Australia in 2020

No Compromise When it comes to the safety of children, we do not tolerate any risk! Evorie Tritan Baby Milk Feeding Bottle conforms to stringent regulatory standards European Regulation 10/2011 and EN 14350*. EU Regulation 10/2011 governs the quality of food contact material, whereas EN 14350 is the most stringent and comprehensive set of regulations for the production of drinking equipment intended for children between 0 to 48 months old. Together, the two sets of standards cover a wide variety of safety requirements to inform parents that they are purchasing safe and reliable products for their little ones.

Tritan. Clearly Better Tritan-made products are built to last and undeniably stylish. They are not only stylish but highly functional too. By being heat, odor, and stain resistant, Tritan provides unprecedented practicality and functionality that is unmatched Be it dropping, throwing it or washing it hundreds of times, Tritan-made product lasts! Tritan plastic is durable because it has great shatter resistance. It does not warp or crack in the dishwasher. And, it does not dent or ding. Tritan’s superior toughness works to extend the longevity of its products, saving you money in the long term.

Peace of mind Made by the US Eastman company, Tritan is extremely impact resistant with exceptional dishwasher durability. It is made to withstand the hard knocks and abuses of an active growing toddler. Not only is Tritan durable, results from four third-party labs* demonstrate that Tritan free of BPA, BPS (bisphenol S) and other harmful bisphenols. Tritan is also free of any estrogenic (EA) and androgenic activity (AA). Tired of keep having to change your little ones' bottle every few months due to cracks or breakages, check out Evorie's Tritan bottles and see the difference. * Dept of Pharmacology, UMDNJ-Robert Wood Johnson Medical School; CeeTox Inc; Center for Environmental Biotechology, University of Tennessee; WIL Research Laboratories

Introducing Evorie Ultra-soft Japanese Silicone Nipple Your baby's perfect transition from breast to bottle! The ultra-soft Japanese silicone teat imitates the natural feel of a mother's breast. The anti-colic feature helps reduce gassiness and discomfort, ensuring a happy and healthy baby. Ultra Soft Japanese Silicone Nipple Anti-colic air system prevents unwanted air and reduces colicMimics breastfeeding, reduces bottle rejection and nipple confusionEasy for babies to latch-on and promotes natural feeding action.

Evorie Tritan Award Winning Wide-neck Baby Feeding Bottle, 5 Oz Evorie Tritan Award Winning Wide-neck Baby Feeding Bottle, 8 Oz Evorie Tritan Award Winning Baby Sippy Weighted Straw Cup, 7 Oz Evorie Tritan Kids Water Bottle Mug with Detachable Handles, 10 Oz Material Tritan Tritan Tritan Tritan Award Winning ✓ ✓ ✓ Anti-Colic ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Scratch Resistant ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Stain Resistant ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Shatter Resistant ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Detachable Handles Sold Separately Sold Separately Handles Not Detachable ✓ Colour/Design Daisy, Camelia, BlueBell Daisy, Camelia, BlueBell Apricot, Mint, BlueMoon, Ube, Strawberry, Bumble Bee, Amazon, Day Dream Happy Valley, Sweet Memories, Imaginations, Smiley, Under the Sea Age Range 0 - 6 months 6 - 18 months 6 months - 3 years old 9 months - 4 years old

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The advantages of this bottle is how big this bottle is and is anti-colic to help avoid stomach issues. It makes sure that air doesn’t enter their mouths during feeding. It’s a very strong and durable bottle that doesn’t get ruined when dropped. A very wide top so that it makes cleaning a breeze.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The design of this definitely seemed to make caulic issue better

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very well made and nice baby bottle. It’s wide and very easy to clean, to assemble and disassemble. I love the hand feel of this bottle, it's easier to hold than others. The measurements are easy to read.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not sure what nipple size it is or how to buy more but the bottle is nice
reviews.reviewText: Our baby uses the MAM bottles so I'm always a bit hesitant to introduce new bottles to her. But I was curious about this one as I like the material as I've not heard of it before. It's comfortable to hold and my little one seems to hold it much more comfortably than MAM (since that one has a thick base). The nipple she seemed to have some trouble with but I did this when she was hungry and she eventually took it. I don't understand how the anti-colic function works as MAM has a design on the base and Dr. Brown's bottles have that little green piece, so I guess I just have to trust it works. One thing is that I can't find where to buy different sized nipples. Also, I don't know what size this one is. Many babies increase nipple sizes throughout their first year, so that might be a concern here. Mine is on the same size since she was about 3 months, so I'm thinking we'll be fine. But even so, that's my only con here. The bottle itself is nice and sleek looking, as well as easy to wash and sterilize. Worth a try for sure if your little one isn't taking any of the popular brands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: easy to handle, easy to clean and read , but unfortunately it leaks .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is durable and easy to clean. My granddaughter is picky on her nipples and refused to latch to this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Anti colic nipple bottle
reviews.reviewText: Evorie Tritan Wide Neck Anti-Colic BPA-Free Baby Milk Feeding Bottle with Soft Silicone Nipple. Having a baby with colic can drive a parent mad. These bottle have a nipple with a vent that you keep towards the top to reduce air getting into the babies tummy. The bottle is a hard clear plastic Tritan. I like that it is clear and has ounces/ml markings on the side. It is durable and survives drops easily. It fit my bottle warmer without any issues. But my bottle warmer fits every bottle I have tried.
